doc.field: Horizons, Inc obtained color photography covering Ramsey County on April 8, 2003. Horizons, Inc used LIDAR DEM provided by Waggoner Inc. to create digital ortho images. Horizons, Inc also collected planimetric features using a combination of analytical and soft-copy technology.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata> <idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>Ramsey County Orthophotography 2003</title><origin>Ramsey County</origin><pubinfo><publish>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>20051010</pubdate><onlink /></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>Horizons, Inc obtained color photography covering Ramsey County on April 8, 2003. Horizons, Inc used LIDAR DEM provided by Waggoner Inc. to create digital ortho images. Horizons, Inc also collected planimetric features using a combination of analytical and soft-copy technology.</abstract><purpose>The purpose of this project was to provide Ramsey County with Color digital ortho images, and topological correct planimetric features in Arc/INFO Format.</purpose><supplinf>Horizons Incorporated acquired aerial photography utilizing a gyro stabilized wide-angle aerial camera equipped with forward motion compensation (HZ11, ZEISS RMK TOP15, SN: 144123, CFL:152.772). The project was flown at an altitude of 5000 feet above</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20030408</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Ground Condition</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>scheduled to update every 3 years</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-93.234052</westbc><eastbc>-92.981601</eastbc><northbc>45.125198</northbc><southbc>44.877762</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Ramsey County, Minnesota</placekey></place><theme><themekey>Aerial Photography</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>This data set is available to everyone. Fees and policy are published in the Ramsey County Fee Schedule. Charges are variable and are subject to change. See the Ramsey County Fee Schedule for specific information on fees and policy.</accconst><useconst>COPYRIGHT NOTICE The data is Copyright © by the County of Ramsey. All rights reserved. Data Sets: COREDB.DBF (CORE PARCEL ATTRIBUTE DATABASE) EPARDES.DBF (ACS PARCEL DESCRIPTION DB) ECURTAX.DBF (ACS CURRENT TAX DB) ENAMADD.DBF (ACS NAME AND ADDRESS DB) ENAMADDO.DBF (ACS NAME AND ADDRESS OTHER DB) EVALUES.DBF (ACS TAX VALUES DB) EDELTAX.DBF (ACS DELINQUENT TAX DB) ESPASMT.DBF (ACS SPECIAL ASSESSMENTS DB) ETRDETL.DBF (ACS TRANSACTION DETAIL DB) APT.DBF (ASSESSOR'S APARTMENT DESCRIPTION DB) COMMAREA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S COMMERCIAL AREA DESCRIPTION DB) COMMDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S COMMERCIAL BUILDING DESCRIPTION DB) DWELLDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S RESIDENTIAL DWELLING DESCRIPTION DB) LANDDATA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S LAND DESCRIPTION DB) PARCELDA.DBF (ASSESSOR'S PARCEL DESCRIPTION DB) PERMIT.DBF (PERMIT DB) SALES.DBF (SALES DATABASE)</title></citeinfo></crossref><native>Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722</native></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>None</attraccr></attracc><logic>None</logic><complete>None</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>Analytical Aerial Triangulation Summary Date: 05-30-03. This data meets or exceeds the National Map Accuracy Standard (NMAS) - 1/30 of 1 inch at map scale.</horizpar></horizpa><vertacc><vertaccr>Not Applicable as it pertains to a two-dimensional Raster image.</vertaccr></vertacc></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>Scanner: Intergraph PhotoScan TD Photo Digitizing System. Scanner Geometric Calibration: Standard Deviation (sigma) = 1.6710356970 Root Mean Square X = 1.9970393211 Root Mean Square Y = 0.9624905604 Scanner setting: Transmissivity: 0.0151 0.6610 Film Density: 1.8210 0.1778 Gamma: 1.75 Quality Control Procedures: Film was kept in airtight containers prior to scanning. Both the base and emulsion sides of the film were cleaned using a tacky roller system prior to scanning. Color adjustment was achieved by visually matching the tone, contrast, and brightness to the original film. Each scanned image was checked computationally for missing data. Quality Control Procedures for orthophoto production: After individual orthophotos were mosaiced into a regional database, the resulting orthophoto composite was visually inspected for tone balance and image distortion. In areas of image distortion, more suitable orthophoto imagery was inserted, when possible. The final orthophotos were visually inspected for accuracy and consistency.</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale>2400</srcscale></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref /><direct>Raster</direct><mgmg3obj /><mgmg3til /></spdoinfo><spref><horizsys><geograph><latres /><longres /></geograph><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>County Coordinates</gridsysn><utm><utmzone /></utm><spcs><spcszone /></spcs><mgmg4coz>43</mgmg4coz><mgmg4adj /></gridsys><mapproj><mapprojn /><mgmg4par /><otherprj /></mapproj><planci><plandu>Feet</plandu><coordrep><absres>0.500000</absres><ordres>0.500000</ordres></coordrep></planci></planar><geodetic><ellips>GRS80</ellips><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>ZEISS RMK TOP 15 Calibrated focal length: 152.773 mm.
